name: Hyper WorldGen Guide
landing_text: Welcome to HyperWorldGen Thanks For Playing And Experience – the ultimate hardcore challenge. 1500+ biomes, 50 km high, 25 km deep, 38000000+ challenge, and over 4,000,000,000 quests await you. Every block mined, every milestone achieved, and every biome explored will test your limits. Survive, conquer, and unlock the secrets hidden in the depths of this extreme world. Your journey starts here – do you have what it takes?
